## Internet access

* UCLGuest
  * Requires registration
  * Can use SWC address
     * `25 Howland St, London W1T 4JG`


## Ask for help

* Ask any member of NIU
* Use the `OSW-2025` channel on Zulip
* Work together
* Let Adam know if you don't want to appear in photos

## Join the socials
* Monday: walk to Primrose Hill
* Tuesday: Celtic folk music in King's Cross
* Wednesday: pub quiz at SWC
* Thursday: AlgoChill in Farringdon ([sign up](https://lu.ma/3z1ureee))

Feel free to self-organise using the "Social" topic on Zulip!

## The Software Sustainability Institute (SSI)
<https://www.software.ac.uk/>

>The SSI was the first organisation in the world dedicated to improving software in research. They help build better and more sustainable research software to enable world-class research.

::: aside
[Fellowship applications open](https://www.software.ac.uk/programmes/fellowship-programme/apply-fellowship-programme)

(Niko and Alessandro are current fellows and happy to advise)
:::
